short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the KBB plugin for MM - COXB - Internal Time Tracker Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculates the timespent on a ticket.

MM - COXB is an internal extension that lets you.
1. Work on JIRA tickets with simple Start, Pause and Stop button.
2. Calculates the timespent on tickets in JIRA.
3. Removes manual entries in time tracker.

Increase Productivity, save time.
